question: Examine the map given below : The places marked 1, 2, 3 and 4 were respectively the seats of powers of the
explanation:
• Scindia was a Hindu Kunbi Maratha dynasty that ruled the Gwalior State.
• Malhar Rao Holkar was a Maratha chief serving Peshwa Baji Rao. He established the dynasty\'s rule over Indore. In the 1720s, he led Maratha armies in Malwa region, and in 1733 was granted 9 parghanas in the vicinity of Indore by the Peshwa.
• The capital of the Gaekwads was initially Songadh till 1765 and then Patan during the regime of Damajirao II before it shifted to Baroda.
Bhonsle were headquartered in Indore and Nagpur.
